directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat; heat the curry paste in the oil about 30 seconds. Add the chicken and cook another 3 minutes. Stir in the onion, bell pepper, lemon zest, coconut milk, fish sauce, and lemon juice; bring to a boil; cook until the chicken is cooked through, 5 to 7 minutes. Sprinkle cilantro over the dish; stir. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cut into strips
1 red bell pepper, cut into strips
title: Thai Chicken Curry in Coconut Milk
